siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Push ideas out
frontmatter.description: Keep pushing out new ideas. Brainstorm on a single topic and create a list of ideas to get influenced creatively. Let the ideas spill over to other areas to keep moving forward.

frontmatter.title: Develop a sounding board for ideas
frontmatter.description: Develop a sounding board for new ideas. Give them chance early on in projects to give feedback & save time later.

frontmatter.title: Capture original ideas by taking regular notes
frontmatter.description: Capture original ideas by taking regular notes. Use pen and paper for best results & usability.
